rules_text:
When Syndicate Kingpin enters the battlefield, surveil 1, then draw a card. [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
Whenever Syndicate Kingpin deals combat damage to a player, you may exile it. If you do, return it to the battlefield at the beginning of your next upkeep.
